overview: Cardio Dance Fusion is an exhilarating, heart-pumping workout which combines cardio, dance, and dance toning moves that are tons of fun! No dance experience is required and two left-feet will not stop you from having a blast and getting the benefits of this ultimate, high-energy experience. Dance the night away to a slimmer, trimmer, and sexier body.
title: The FIRM: Cardio Dance Fusion
